titles.title: To revise the boundaries of Fort Matanzas National Monument in the State of Florida to include additional land and to authorize the acquisition of the land, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands.

bill.summary: 11/2/1999--Introduced. Revises the boundaries of the Fort Matanzas National Monument in Florida to add approximately 70 acres. Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to acquire any land, water, or interests in land that are located within the revised boundaries by donation, purchase, transfer from any other Federal agency, or exchange. Authorizes appropriations.
